Ira.definition: an account in which a person may deposit up to a stipulated amount each year and that is not taxable until retirement or early withdrawal NOTE
Ira.origin: [ i ndividual r etirement a ccount]

1.1: an account in which a person may deposit up to a stipulated amount each year and that is not taxable until retirement or early withdrawal
1.note: Deposits to an IRA may not be completely or partially deductible from adjusted gross income if one's income exceeds a set level.
